news_header: Jeff Clark predicts gold will reach $3,000 per ounce by 2025 and believes the current downcycle in gold stocks will end soon.
news_text: Jeff Clark, editor of Paydirt Prospector, is optimistic about gold prices reaching $3,000 per ounce by 2025. He notes that the current downcycle in gold stocks has lasted 4.3 years, making it the second longest ever, and suggests that it is due to end soon. Clark believes we are in a bull market and that it is just a matter of time before gold stocks catch up. He encourages viewers to check out the interview for more insights on gold and exploration.
